contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 16, 1899 D Barton-on-Humber Contest
Barton-on-Humber Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
barton-on-humber-contest
None
Donizetti [arr. Round]
Brigg Road, Barton-on-Humber, Lincolnshire, England, UK 1st prize £6. 2nd prize £4. 3rd prize £2 and 4th prize £1.10s. divided between Scunthorpe Rifles and East Hull. 5th prize £1. March contest 1st (£1) Scunthorpe Rifles, 2nd (10s.) divided between East Kirkby and Grimsby Borough. Best cornet - East Hull. Best soprano - Scunthorpe. Best euphonium and trombone - Grimsby Borough.
April 19, 2012, 4:40 p.m. July 10, 2017, 9:49 a.m.
1 Grimsby Borough Band T. Renshaw
2 East Kirkby United R. Few
3 East Hull William Holdsworth
3 Scunthorpe Rifles Fenton Renshaw
5 Doncaster Temperance A. W. Bone
